Texts.Eng:
Stoic, calm and mysterious, the Elduukhar prefer to take the role of artisans or philosophers. They seek discovery and enlightenment.
    
 Diet: Can eat almost anything
 
^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Defense +^green;5^reset;. Max Food x^green;1.3^reset;
  When at 50% Health, emit slowing ice clouds.
  Resist: +^green;25^reset;% Ice, +^green;20^reset;% Physical
  Tech: ^green;Crystal Breath, Elduukhar Flight^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Aether Sea, Crystal, Chromatic, Red Desert^reset; biomes:
    Health x^green;1.25^reset; and +^green;10^reset;% Crit Damage.
  ^green;Hot^reset; biomes:
    Defense x^green;1.15^reset; and Health x^red;0.75^reset;.
  ^red;Cold^reset; biomes:
    Defense x^red;0.85^reset; and Health x^green;1.25^reset;.

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Longsword, Axe, Greataxe:
    +^green;12^reset;% Max Health & Defense
  Whip, Chakram, Boomerang, Lunari:
    Energy & Damage x^green;1.12^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;High Food Cost^reset; for Crystal Breath attack and Flight.
  Resist: -^red;20^reset;% Electric, -^red;20^reset;% Poison, -^red;10^reset;% Shadow
